text: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ

translation.en: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people
translation.id: Dan kebiasaannya menyembah selain Allah mencegahnya (untuk menampakkan keislamannya), sesungguhnya dia (Balqis) dahulu termasuk orang-orang kafir
